Page.ScreenName: Cost Center Outside Purchases History Report
Page.Table:
PMC:ReportSelectionTable
Enter Starting Period (YYYYPP) Text PPDField01 3 6 R Enter a valid starting period (YYYYPP)
Enter Ending Period (YYYYPP) Text PPDField02 3 6 R Enter a valid ending period (YYYYPP)
Enter Starting Date (MM/DD/YY) Text PPDField03 6 8 R Enter a valid starting date
Enter Ending Date (MM/DD/YY) Text PPDField04 6 8 R Enter a valid ending date
Enter Department Code or (ALL) Text PPDField05 1 5 R Enter a Valid Department Code or (ALL)
Enter Starting Cost Center or (ALL) Text PPDField06 1 3 R Enter a valid cost center # or (ALL)
Enter Ending Cost Center No. or (ALL) Text PPDField07 1 3 R Enter a valid cost center # or (ALL)
